content: festive cowl by cathy baucom 1 ©cathy baucom 2020 all rights reserved yarn c1 - knot house pearl sock 459 yards/50 gm color spruce it up c2 - knot house barber pole 437 yards/100 gm color christmas cactus needles & notions needles us 5/3 75 mm circular 24 in length needles us 3/3 25 mm circular 24 in length stitch marker measuring tape tapestry needle blocked measurements height 13 width top and bottom 15 5 notes measurements can easily be changed by cast on and length of all panels gauge isn t critical abbreviations k knit k1tbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop p purl pm place marker sl1 slip one as if to purl bor beginning of the round stitch glossary twisted rib *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to the end of round pattern cast on 192 stitches in c1 with us 3 needle join in the round being careful not to twist place bor marker knit 2 of twisted rib change to us 5 needle join c2 row 1 using c2 *sl1 k2* repeat to bor row 2 using c2 *sl1 p2* repeat to bor row 3 using c1 knit around repeat these three row for 10 change to us 3 needle knit 2 of twisted rib bind off loosely in pattern weave in ends and wet block for questions about the pattern please contact cathy baucom website www knothouse com email see contact form on website instagram @theknothouse ravelry the knot house 2 ©cathy baucom 2020 all rights reserved
